title: Fragments, 1700–08
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: damassé foundation fabric (8-harness satin plus plain weave) plus discontinuous supplementary wefts bound on the front in 1/3 twill by the foundation warp
dimensions:
Overall (Dimensions of A): 91.5 x 41 cm (36 x 16 1/8 in.)
Overall (Dimension of B): 90.5 x 26.5 cm (35 5/8 x 10 7/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Arthur J. Cohen
description: Flowering tree in an urn in the "Bizarre" style in multi-color silk and metallic superimposed on a shadow-like pattern in salmon on salmon background. Unit of straight repeat: 63.5 cm x 25.5 cm (25 x 10 in.)

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 1700–08.
1700–08. Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: damassé foundation fabric (8-harness satin plus plain weave) plus discontinuous supplementary wefts bound on the front in 1/3 twill by the foundation warp. Gift of Mrs. Arthur J. Cohen. 1975-88-1-a,b.
